parameters: The suspiciously strange music coming from the end of
this path fills you with worry.\. You don't even
believe one of your friends is here...
You feel like this was a bad idea.
\n<???>We'll have the adventure of a lifetime!
\n<Sunny>Oh!\. Well look what we have here!
\n<Sunny>It's you, Sebastian!\. And you brought a new pal, too!
\n<Sunny>Well, I'll be darned!\. I didn't think you'd come back
\n<Sunny>(I thought I'd have to find you myself...)
\n<Sunny>This is just great!\. Just fine and dandy!
\n<Sunny>After all,\. since that Munster guy told me what ya
really did...\. I've just been wanting to...\. to...\.
You and Beck equip your weapons.
\n<Sunny>Oh!\. So you really wanna go again, huh?
\n<Sunny>Well,\. shiver me timbers!\. Or, I mean...\. uh...\.
\n<???>Oh, screw it with this accent!\. I'm not really Sunny!\.
I'm just a figment of your creation!
\n<???>And if I came from the innermost recesses of your

parameters.name: NOBODY WATCHING (Petaly's weird route)  Music Section Reupload - NoNo Le Rigolo

parameters: \n<Friend>You've gotten too strong.\. No wonder Munster lost to
\n<Friend>Spare me,\. and I won't bother you again, please...
\n<Friend>Maybe if you can do this...\. then there's a chance
The Friend Inside You gives you his Pistol.
There is no longer a Friend Inside You.

parameters.name: NOBODY WATCHING (Petaly's weird route)  Music Section Reupload - NoNo Le Rigolo
